department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The Department of National Defence Garrison Petawawa weapons lockers for weapon securing and storage.
full_summary:
### W6448-24C009 Tender Announcement - Armored Weapons Storage Container and Lockers

**Reference Number**
WS4348736819-Doc4348785282

**Publication Date**
2023-12-11

**Tender Closing Date and Time**
2023-12-28 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)

**Procurement Description**
The Department of National Defence (DND) Garrison Petawawa is seeking offers from qualified suppliers to provide armored weapons storage containers and lockers for securing and storing weapons.

**Procurement Details**

* Proposed Delivery Location: Petawawa, Canada
* Unspsc: 46151802, 56101520, 56101530 (Armored weapons storage container, lockers, storage cabinets)
* Anticipated Contract Start Date: 2024-01-05
* Anticipated Contract End Date: 2024-03-29
* Selected Bidders will be awarded a contract based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Evaluation Criteria**
Offers will be evaluated on the basis of a combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

**Contact Information**
For more information or to submit a bid, please contact Darlene Keenan, Contracting Officer, at darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Additional Resources**
Please visit the Ariba Discovery website ([https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18246565?extsite=MTgyNDY1NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18246565?extsite=MTgyNDY1NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)) for more information about this procurement opportunity.

**Bid Submission Requirements**
All bids must be submitted by December 28, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Failure to meet this deadline may result in the bid being declared non-responsive.  Best regards.  [Keenan, Darlene (SPAC/PSPC) (elle-la / she-her)](mailto:darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)	action /**

Best regards, your expert
